product.title: Meyer Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
product.description: Strikingly complex and detailed, with supple, harmonious blackberry, currant, anise, licorice and crushed rock flavors. Gains depth while holding focus and persistence.

product.title: Kendall-Jackson Chardonnay California Vintner's Reserve
product.description: Plush, with loads of richness to the well-honed flavors of beeswax, baked pear and lemon tart. Minerally midpalate, with a fresh and zesty finish that finishes with pastry notes.

product.title: Prager Riesling Federspiel Trocken Wachau Steinriegl
product.description: A fruity style, boasting apricot, ripe apple, white pepper, mineral and floral notes, this is harmonious and fresh, leaving a sapid, mineral aftertaste.

product.title: Louis Roederer Brut Champagne
product.description: Refined in texture and beautifully balanced, this well-meshed version is framed by mouthwatering acidity, enlivened by flavors of yellow apple, pear, black currant, lightly toasted almond, kumquat and zesty ground spice.

product.title: Domaine Tempier Bandol Rosé
product.description: Bright and high-pitched, this features a talc note that gives way to rosemary and white cherry hints, while the finish races along with sea salt and blood orange details. Long, chiseled and pure. A delicious rosé that should unwind further with some cellaring

product.title: Syrah Walla Walla Valley Powerline Estate
product.description: A knockout Syrah, precise and impeccably built but explosive with personality. Smoky roasted meat and floral blackberry aromas combine with bold, supple flavors of dark plum, pepper and licorice. The tannins are big but polished.

product.title: Rust en Vrede Syrah Stellenbosch
product.description: This is well-rendered, with a core of bramble-edged boysenberry, blackberry and raspberry fruit laced with mouthwatering savory and anise notes. Shows judicious toast through the finish, as roasted apple wood details dance through, letting the fruit win out in the end.

product.title: PlumpJack Syrah Napa Valley
product.description: Polished and impeccably structured, with blackberry and smoky meat aromas and layered, rich flavors of licorice and espresso that linger toward big but firm tannins.

product.title: Meyer Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
product.description: Strikingly complex and detailed, with supple, harmonious blackberry, currant, anise, licorice and crushed rock flavors. Gains depth while holding focus and persistence.

product.title: Viña Santa Ema Cabernet Sauvignon Maipo Valley Reserva
product.description: Dark plum and dried red berry flavors dominate this muscular red, with plenty of minty and savory accents. Medium-grained tannins support chocolate and cream details on the finish.

product.title: Penley Cabernet Sauvignon Coonawarra Phoenix
product.description: Dense tannins and flavors are packed into this wine, with briny Kalamata olive and black licorice nuances to the core of plum, cassis, sage, tobacco and cedar flavors, which fan out on the finish.

product.title: Colene Clemens Pinot Noir Chehalem Mountains Dopp Creek
product.description: Firm and focused, with cinnamon notes floating around red berry and floral flavors, finishing with gentle persistence against lively acidity and fine tannins.

product.title: Innocent Bystander Pinot Noir Yarra Valley
product.description: Plush and elegant, with raspberry, cherry and fresh sage notes that are harmonious, juicy and intense on the finish.

product.title: Purple Hands Pinot Noir Dundee Hills Latchkey Vineyard
product.description: Silky and harmonious, with an elegantly precise structure and black cherry, fresh violet and spice notes that glide expressively toward the long finish.

product.title: • Bedrock Zinfandel California Old Vine
product.description: Rich and supple, this is an explosion of pure, decadent fruit. Floral huckleberry and Chinese five-spice powder aromas open to layered blackberry, dark chocolate and licorice flavors that linger.

product.title: Turley Zinfandel Paso Robles Ueberroth Vineyard
product.description: An impressive combo of refinement and torque. This features ripe, rich fruit backed by great minerality and structure, with notes of raspberry and blackberry plus licorice, sage and pepper.

product.title: Hartford Family Zinfandel Russian River Valley Old Vine
product.description: This is what Russian River Zinfandel is all about. Rich, dynamic and layered, with complex fruit, offering notes of jammy black raspberry, stony mineral, herbes de Provence and licorice. The finish unfurls at length. 2015

product.title: Kendall-Jackson Chardonnay California Vintner's Reserve
product.description: Plush, with loads of richness to the well-honed flavors of beeswax, baked pear and lemon tart. Minerally midpalate, with a fresh and zesty finish that finishes with pastry notes.

product.title: • Pahlmeyer Chardonnay Napa Valley
product.description: This offers a gorgeous mouthful of rich, buttery Chardonnay, loaded with exotic tropical fruit, pear, melon and pineapple flavors. Impressive for its opulence and silkiness, a nice combination.

product.title: Sixto Chardonnay Washington Uncovered
product.description: Dynamic, yet sleek and refined, driven by a core of minerally acidity that meshes with the delicately complex apple, Meyer lemon and spicy yeast accents that linger long on the finish.

product.title: Sidebar Sauvignon Blanc High Valley
product.description: Focused and precise, with detailed lemon meringue, orange blossom and lime zest flavors that are intense, fragrant and harmonious on the long, crisp finish.

product.title: Matua Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
product.description: Succulent, fleshy peach and nectarine flavors are accented by Key lime, mango and ruby grapefruit notes. Shows nice intensity on the long, expressive finish.

product.title: Mason Sauvignon Blanc Napa Valley Yount Mill Vineyard
product.description: Clean, smooth and crisp, offering a lip-smacking mix of pear, melon and Key lime flavors, with plenty of intensity on the finish.

product.title: Torre Rosazza Pinot Grigio Friuli Colli Orientali
product.description: This creamy, medium-bodied version is framed by finely cut acidity that focuses the rich minerality and flavors of guava, star fruit, pickled ginger and oak spice. Lingering finish.

product.title: Attems Pinot Grigio Venezia-Giulia
product.description: Offers pineapple pie, vanilla cream and honey on the nose. Full-bodied, with a very ripe, almost decadent tropical fruit character and lots of rich fruit.

product.title: Prager Riesling Federspiel Trocken Wachau Steinriegl
product.description: A fruity style, boasting apricot, ripe apple, white pepper, mineral and floral notes, this is harmonious and fresh, leaving a sapid, mineral aftertaste.

product.title: Selbach-Oster Riesling Kabinett Halbtrocken Mosel Zeltinger Himmelreich
product.description: Pungent, with aromas of slate and ripe orchard fruit, this sleek white displays complex flavors of flowers, peach, quince and slate. A hint of chive works into the mix as this remains persistent on the finish.

product.title: Robert Weil Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Rheingau Kiedricher Gräfenberg GG
product.description: Very rich and complex, with enveloping flavors of baked apple, ripe citrus, nectarine and dried pear supported by a powerful structure. Lush midpalate, with a notes of dried guava, followed by unctuous spiciness on the finish, with accents of white chocolate, chamomile and dried herbs.

product.title: Bérêche & Fils Brut Champagne Réserve
product.description: Racy acidity firms up this rich Champagne, with a honeyed overtone to the well-spiced palate of grilled nut, poached pear, lemon parfait and ripe raspberry. Lacy in texture, with a smoke-tinged finish.

product.title: Pierre Paillard Brut Champagne
product.description: Shows lovely balance, with a satiny quality to the refined mousse and mouthwatering acidity meshing with pure notes of poached quince, lemon mousse, white cherry and fresh ginger. Offers a lightly chalky finish.

product.title: Louis Roederer Brut Champagne
product.description: Refined in texture and beautifully balanced, this well-meshed version is framed by mouthwatering acidity, enlivened by flavors of yellow apple, pear, black currant, lightly toasted almond, kumquat and zesty ground spice.

product.title: Collalto Prosecco Di Conegliano Valdobbiadene Brut
product.description: Dry, light and racy with a touch of fruit sweetness on the mid-palate, persistent bubbles and a crisp, aromatic finish. Elegantly enjoyable on its own or with light fish and vegetable dishes. Beautifully balanced, this gets the Goldilocks rating for being just right.

product.title: La Gioiosa DOCG Prosecco Italy NV
product.description: A great bottle to kick start any event, this is classic prosecco with honey and white flower aromas, boasting big, fresh flavours of nectarine, ripe pear and juicy apple. The sweetness is delicately balanced and stays on the right side of dry. Effortlessly delicious and a joy to drink.

product.title: Aldi Valdobbiadene Prosecco Spumante Superiore NV
product.description: A firm favourite, judging by the reviews on Aldi’s website. Its DOCG Prosecco appears to be a go-to for festive parties and for less than £8 its appeal is obvious: light with enough personality to enjoy on its own (even if a tad heavy on the confected pear) but also the perfect mixer for bellinis, negroni sbagliato or a Venetian spritz with Aperol or Campari. Loads of options, just don’t get lumped with cocktail duty.

product.title: Domaine Tempier Bandol Rosé
product.description: Bright and high-pitched, this features a talc note that gives way to rosemary and white cherry hints, while the finish races along with sea salt and blood orange details. Long, chiseled and pure. A delicious rosé that should unwind further with some cellaring.

product.title: Jolie-Pitt & Perrin Côtes de Provence Rosé Miraval
product.description: Refined and elegant, offering pure and concentrated flavors of dried red berry, tangerine and melon. The focused finish features flint and spice notes, with a hint of cream.

product.title: Domaines Bunan Bandol Rosé Moulin des Costes
product.description: Offers a lovely combination of zip and richness, with creamy edges around a core of delicious white cherry and white peach flavors, all offset by a pure beam of minerality that pierces through from start to finish.
